Class TodoService

java.lang.Object
com.education.ztu.service.TodoService
public class TodoService extends Object
Service class for managing Todo items.

      Finds a Todo item by its ID.
      Parameters:
      id - the UUID of the Todo item to find
      Returns:
      an Optional containing the Todo item if found, or empty if not found

      Parameters:

      Returns:
      true if the Todo was updated, false if not found
